subject: Re: [junit] how to ensure only one test runs at a time?
msgSnippet: ... If that is not correct then there are two of us having brain dead afternoons :) It would take a considerably larger effort to make the tests run
messageBody:
> Unless I'm having a really brain dead Friday afternoon, this is the
> default behaviour of JUnit. All tests are run sequentially (order is
> undefined) and each test will complete (or fail) before the next one
> is started.

If that is not correct then there are two of us having brain dead afternoons :)
It would take a considerably larger effort to make the tests run concurrently.
